doc.title: Feasibility Study: Indulging Anxiety
doc.plot: Feasibility Study starts with the main character Martin getting laid off from his job. The following morning he is left with a lot to think about but nothing to do. He stands above his kitchen stove and begins to day dream and what follows illustrates his mixed emotions from being fired from a job he disliked. We follow him back to his office in his day dream where numerous surreal events transpire. Martin finds himself in a mental loop dealing with inadequacy and ego.
